is_set.description: True if this flag has been set, false otherwise

boot.description: True if this disk is the boot disk for the node

capacity_MB.description: The max capacity of the disk, in MB.

name.description: A human-readable nice name for the disk

node_id.description: The ID of the node this disk is inside

node_name.description: The name of the node this disk is inside

osds.description: A list of the OSDs associated with this disk

path.description: The path to the disk device

wwn.description: A unique ID for this disk

capacity_MB.description: The max capacity of the disk, in MB

name.description: A human-readable nice name for the disk

path.description: The path to the disk device

reserved.description: True if this fan is in reserved mode

speed.description: Current speed fan is running at, in RPM.

alerts.description: A list of alerts firing for this node

asset.description: User defined asset tag for the node

firmware_bmc.description: The version of the firmware this node's BMC is running

firmware_uefi.description: The version of the firmware this node's SoC is running

id.description: A unique ID for the node

identify_led.description: True if this node's identify LED is on

in_cluster.description: True if this node is in a Ceph cluster

memory_GB.description: The amount of RAM this node has, in GB

power_w.description: The average power draw of this node, in watts

roles.description: The roles this node has been given

temperature_c.description: The average temperature of this node in centigrade

up.description: True if the host is up

capacity_MB.description: The max capacity of this logical volume, in MB.

path.description: The path to the logical volume

uuid.description: A unique ID for this partition

alerts.description: A list of alerts being fired for this OSD

capacity_MB.description: Amount of storage this OSD has

id.description: A unique ID for the OSD

node_id.description: A unique ID for the node

node_ip.description: The public IP address of this node

used_MB.description: Amount of this OSD's storage that is being used

utilization_percent.description: The percentage of this OSD's total storage that is being used

capacity_MB.description: The max capacity of the partition, in MB.

path.description: The path to the partition on the disk

used_by.description: The OSDs that use this partition

uuid.description: A unique ID for this partition

capacity_MB.description: The max capacity of the physical volume, in MB

partition_index.description: Index of the partition within the disk, 0 for a whole disk

path.description: The path to the physical volume device

used_by.description: The OSDs that use this physical volume

deleting.description: True if this RBD is being deleted

id.description: A unique ID for the service
A unique ID for the share

osd_count.description: The total number of OSDs inthe cluster

version_name.description: The name of the Ceph version

capacity_MB.description: The max capacity of this volume group, in MB.

node_id.description: The ID of the node this volume groupis in

node_name.description: The name of the node this volume group is inside

physical_volumes.description: The physical volumes in this volume group

used_by.description: The OSDs that use this volume group

nanos.description:
Non-negative fractions of a second at nanosecond resolution. Negative
second values with fractions must still have non-negative nanos values
that count forward in time. Must be from 0 to 999,999,999
inclusive.

seconds.description:
Represents seconds of UTC time since Unix epoch
1970-01-01T00:00:00Z. Must be from 0001-01-01T00:00:00Z to
9999-12-31T23:59:59Z inclusive.
